questions.question: What makes blockchain technology famous?
options: A) It provides features of digitization, trust, and immutability.
B) It is a new type of internet
C) It is used for cryptocurrency only
D) It is not secure at all

questions.question: Do we need a technical background to get into blockchain?
options: A) Yes, but not necessarily. You can still understand blockchain and be an adviser if you don't have technical skills.
B) No, you just need to learn the basics
C) It is required for any career in blockchain
D) You can learn it on your own

questions.question: What are the prerequisites for learning blockchain?
options: A) Cryptography, distributed computing, game theory, and other basic concepts.
B) Additional option 2
C) Additional option 3
D) Additional option 4

questions.question: How do you secure your website from hackers?
options: A) Use strong passwords
B) Enable two-factor authentication
C) Keep your software up to date
D) All of the above

questions.question: What is the best way to optimize images for web development?
options: A) Compressing images using tools like TinyPNG
B) Using high-quality images that are not compressed
C) Using low-resolution images
D) None of the above

questions.question: How do you handle errors in web development?
options: A) By ignoring them and hoping they go away
B) By using try-catch blocks to catch exceptions
C) By logging errors and sending notifications
D) All of the above

questions.question: What is the importance of testing in web development?
options: A) Testing helps ensure that your website works as expected
B) Additional option 2
C) Additional option 3
D) Additional option 4

questions.question: How do you keep your code organized and maintainable?
options: A) By using a consistent naming convention
B) By keeping your code in one place
C) By commenting out unnecessary code
D) All of the above

questions.question: What is the best way to handle user input validation?
options: A) Using regular expressions to validate input
B) Using a whitelist approach to validate input
C) Using a blacklist approach to validate input
D) All of the above

questions.question: How do you ensure that your website is accessible?
options: A) By using alt text for images
B) By providing a clear and consistent navigation menu
C) By making sure all content is readable
D) All of the above
